name: Hell Yeah, Burgers! VR
description:
Gianna Remy, one of the best chefs in the world, is here to give you a test of skill. Take orders, cook, fry, chop, and assemble gourmet burgers for her to judge. But don’t get cocky, she isn’t easily impressed.

This game is in active weekly development! We'll be posting video or text updates every Tuesday talking about new features, addressing your feedback, and talking about development.

This game has been developed for the Vive and Oculus Rift.

https://twitter.com/HellYeahBurgers

http://www.hellyeahburgers.com/
